Class XmlDOMWriter

Object

      org.attoparser.markup.xml.XmlDOMWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDOMWriter
public final class XmlDOMWriter
extends AbstractDOMWriter

Specialization of XmlDOMWriter for writing attoDOM trees as XML markup.

Since:
1.1

Daniel Fernández
